column2: But the haughty monarch was incapable of the magnanimity which dares to acknowledge a fault.
column3: But the haughty monarch was incapable of the magnanimity which dares to acknowledge a fault.

column2: He reviled, in the most intemperate language, their baseness, their ingratitude, their insolence.
column3: He reviled, in the most intemperate language, their baseness, their ingratitude, their insolence.
